name: Carrot Bundt® Cake with Cream Cheese Filling
author: Donna
summary: This is a wonderful filled Bundt® cake with the frosting inside! It is always a favorite at carry-in dinners and potlucks.
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease and flour a fluted tube pan (such as Bundt®)
Combine cream cheese, sugar, and egg in a bowl for filling, mixing until well blended
Combine flour, sugar, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt for cake in a bowl
Add oil and eggs; mix until moistened
Reserve 2 cups of batter; pour remaining batter into the prepared pan
Pour cream cheese mixture over batter
Spoon reserved batter carefully over cream cheese mixture, spreading to cover
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 55 minutes
Cool for 10 minutes; remove from the pan
